thread.title: Melbourne nurse faces permanent hair loss from Alopecia | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Melbourne nurse faces permanent hair loss from Alopecia | Daily Mail Online

author: Sinead Maclaughlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Melbourne nurse faces permanent hair loss from Alopecia | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I look like a Barbie doll that's been attacked by a kid': Woman, 28, who suffers from hair loss due to Alopecia says she feels 'embarrassed' and like she's 'losing her identity' Carley Manhire, 28, diagnosed with Alopecia Areata Ophias nearly 10 years ago She faces permanent hair loss as her condition fails to respond to treatment Medical regime left the nurse feeling nauseous, anxious and saw her gain weight Fundraising for a medical grade wig and National Alopecia Areata Foundation A medical grade wig can cost $5000 on average and act 'like second skin' Published: 13:57 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 20:39 GMT, 16 February 2017 131 shares
